overview: In the 70s & 80s Pro wrestling had its share of bizarre characters and unusual matches. The monsters here feature Monika, Andre The Giant, Lord Humongous, Bruiser Brody & Abdullah The Butcher. From this extreme you will also see the midgets both female and male, Little Bruiser, Princess Little Dove & Little Boy Blue.
title: Wrestling Classics Vol 6: Midgets & Monsters
